price: Ó sì (fi mọ) ọmọ màálù ọ̀bọrọgidi kan jáde fún wọn, tó ń dún (bíi màálù). Wọ́n sì wí pé: “Èyí ni ọlọ́hun yín àti ọlọ́hun Mūsā. Àmọ́ ó ti gbàgbé (rẹ̀).”
arabic: فَأَخۡرَجَ لَهُمۡ عِجۡلٗا جَسَدٗا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٞ فَقَالُواْ هَٰذَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ وَإِلَٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِيَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhraja lahum ʿij'lan jasadan lahu khuwārun faqālū hādhā ilāhukum wa-ilāhu mūsā fanasiya
